underlying_goal: User wanted to update the paper's methodology section to reflect the current, more complex 'same-model' prompt selection strategy, replacing the outdated 'mixed-model' description.
primary_success: Accurately identifying contradictions between the user's described methodology and the paper's text, asking targeted questions to gather necessary details (even using placeholders), and then performing precise updates to the LaTeX source in multiple locations.
brief_summary: User asked if the paper reflected a new sandbagging prompt selection strategy. Claude identified that the paper's text was outdated, describing a previous methodology. Through an iterative conversation, Claude gathered the new criteria, updated the main text and appendix of the paper with placeholders, and finally committed the changes at the user's request.
